meanings.sent1: The nonyellowing flower stayed its original color.
meanings.sent2: The paint remained nonyellowing even after years of sunlight exposure.
meanings.sent3: The nonyellowing banana peel confused the monkeys at the zoo.
meanings.sent4: Her nonyellowing smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The nonyellowing sky was a beautiful shade of blue.

meanings.definition: The act of not becoming yellow
meanings.sent1: The nonyellowing of the leaves was a sign of good health.
meanings.sent2: She studied the nonyellowing of the paper under different conditions.
meanings.sent3: The nonyellowing of the traffic light caused confusion among drivers.
meanings.sent4: His nonyellowing of the cake icing was a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The nonyellowing of the stars in the night sky was mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: She applied the nonyellowing to the painting to preserve its color.
meanings.sent2: The nonyellowing in the plastic kept it looking new for years.
meanings.sent3: The nonyellowing in the shampoo kept her blonde hair bright.
meanings.sent4: The nonyellowing in the varnish protected the wood from discoloration.
meanings.sent5: The nonyellowing in the fabric made the curtains last longer.
